definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: abstain from food, fast (NH id.; Ar. (s.wm) s.a0ma, Eth. s’oma Aram. [[חוּם]], s.om);—

[[חָם]] 2Sa 12:23, Ne 1:4; —fast, in mourning the dead 1Sa 31:13 = 1Ch 10:12, 2Sa 1:12; in worship (contrition, intercession, etc.) Jn 20:26, 1Sa 7:6, 2Sa 12:16 (c. acc. cogn. [[וׇאֱהִי חָם]] Ne 1:4 (periphr. conj.; +[[מִתְפַּלֵּל]]), cf. Ezr 8:23 (+[[בִּפֵּשׁ]]), Es 4:16 (c. [[עַל]] pers. for whom), v:Es 4:16, Is 58:3 (‖[[עִנִּינוּ נַפְשֵׁנוּ]]), v:Is 58:4 (c.
